experiences.title: FullStack Developer

workDescription: Designed and Developed 2 kinds of Smart Contract architecture for implementing scalable, secure and maintainable software solutions, generating more profitably.

experiences.title: Blockchain Developer

workDescription: Led in developing 3 tools that became the foundation for the intersection between Web3 and FinTech.

Chaired daily Scrum meetings to discuss each goal and blocker for a day.
